programme.title: Under The Moonlight Ep20
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story follows Luo Shu, who struggles to overcome the trials of fate, and her encounter with the ambitious Qi Meng Lin. Together, they face challenges and solve mysteries.
